title: Emerald Polki Chandbali Earrings - Pachala Kundan Jhumka
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features Uncut Diamond Polki (Kundan) and a vibrant Emerald cabochon. Minor Diamonds for accent.
features: Traditional Chandbali design with a contemporary twist. The central Emerald is surrounded by a halo of Polki diamonds. The design features a geometric pattern, giving a modern feel to this classic style. The gold setting features hand-cut techniques.
occasions: and special occasions. Ideal for Seemantham
or a grand reception. Also suitable for upscale events where a touch of tradition is desired.
description: This Chandbali Jhumka is a unique fusion of traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The vibrant emerald and uncut diamond (Polki) give it a timeless appeal. Crafted with Hyderabadi precision, this piece promises both beauty and durability. A significant investment that can be passed down through generations.
